sentences.sentence: I don’t expect you to know me, but I’ve been following your investigation, and I believe I can assist <color=red>you</color>.
The matter you’re dealing with is delicate, and there’s someone you should speak to next.
The widow. She’s quite familiar with the dwarf and may know how to get through to him.
It’s not an uncommon connection—just neighbors who’ve crossed paths over time, nothing more.
If you wish to proceed, <color=red>she</color> might be the key to getting the answers you need from <color=red>him</color>.
I’ll be here if you need more guidance. But for now, speak with <color=red>her</color>. She holds the next step.
